full_summary:
====================================

# Government Tender Announcement

## Invitation to Tender: W0103-249502 - CFB Esquimalt Wardroom Furniture

**Procurement ID:** W0103-249502
**English Title:** CFB Esquimalt Wardroom Furniture – Tables and Chairs
**French Title:** BFC Esquimalt du carré de la BFC Esquimalt – Tables et chaises

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to procure assorted dining tables and chairs for the Wardroom (Building SH586) and Building 585 at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt, Victoria, British Columbia.

## Tender Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Regions of Opportunity:** British Columbia
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

## Tender Status

The tender is expired.

## Key Dates

* **Publication Date:** October 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Pacific Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** January 15, 2025

## Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact Darlene Thorne, Contracting Authority, at darlene.thorne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Note:** This tender is no longer active and is provided for historical purposes only.

While I tried to condense the information into a concise and readable format, remember that key information like the amended number and procurement status can be crucial to indicating that the tender isn't active anymore due to expiry or rejection for other unforeseen reasons. As a result, cross-verifying information with the official government website or contacting the contracting authority directly would grant you a fuller understanding of the situation. Ensure you also access relevant documentation before making any informed decisions.
